title: Hydrologic Modeling in Arid Systems
text:
This repository documents a one-month self-directed curriculum focused on defensible groundwater and hydrologic modeling in arid and semi-arid systems, with an emphasis on:

Sparse data environments

Groundwater-dominated basins

Recharge uncertainty

Open-source modeling tools

The goal is not to produce “perfect” models, but to understand, explain, and defend modeling assumptions, consistent with real-world consulting practice.

title: Hydrologic Modeling in Arid Systems

Structure
The curriculum is organized into four weeks, each combining: - Conceptual grounding - Hands-on modeling - Uncertainty analysis - Professional communication

title: Week 1 – Conceptual Models & Arid Hydrology
